name: part_004
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ3D】シャチ出没注意【ホロライブ】 [MOekZ-g5qJQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe prepares for the back extension (Joutai Sorashi) challenge, discussing her expected performance and the difficulty of doing it on the floor.
Chloe makes her first attempt at the back extension, but is frustrated when the staff doesn't immediately give her a result.
Chloe receives a disappointing result (15cm) and is forced to do a second attempt, which ends in exhaustion and complaints about the unfairness.
Chloe transitions to the abdominal challenge, only to be horrified that it involves an ab roller instead of standard sit-ups. She struggles and fails.
Chloe asserts her confidence in regular sit-ups and begins preparing her position for a 30-second challenge.

subtitles.original: 沙花叉クロヱ、上体反らし...
subtitles.english: Sakamata Chloe, back extension...

subtitles.original: やったこと、まあ、あるっちゃあるけど、うん。
subtitles.english: I've done it, well, I guess I have, but, yeah.

subtitles.original: 何センチぐらいが基本なんですかね？
subtitles.english: How many centimeters is the standard?

subtitles.original: 何センチぐらい... あ、メジャー、メジャー。
subtitles.english: How many centimeters... Ah, tape measure, tape measure.

subtitles.original: あ、でもでもでも、
subtitles.english: Ah, but but but,

subtitles.original: たぶんなんだけど...
subtitles.english: I think...

subtitles.original: 60とか65とか68とか、60ぐらい行けんじゃだい？
subtitles.english: Maybe 60, 65, 68... I can probably do about 60?

subtitles.original: 60とか無理かな？
subtitles.english: Is 60 impossible?

subtitles.original: L、いけそうじゃない？ 頑張れば。
subtitles.english: Size L, doesn't it seem possible? If I try hard.

subtitles.original: ちょっとやってみる？
subtitles.english: Want to try it?

subtitles.original: やってみるか、実際。行きますか。
subtitles.english: Shall I try, actually. Let's go.

subtitles.original: 沙花叉クロヱちゃんの上体反らし。
subtitles.english: Sakamata Chloe's back extension.

subtitles.original: あー、あの企画とはいえかわいそうだよね、床に袖るの。そう思わないみんな？
subtitles.english: Ah... even if it's a project, it's a bit sad to be on the floor. Don't you all think so?

subtitles.original: いくよ！
subtitles.english: Here I go!

subtitles.original: みんないい？ いくよ？
subtitles.english: Everyone ready? Here I go?

subtitles.original: 沙花叉の好きなタイミングで、いくよ？
subtitles.english: At my own timing, here I go?

subtitles.original: せーの、はい！
subtitles.english: One, two, go!

subtitles.original: はい！ どう？ どう？ 何センチですか？
subtitles.english: Yes! How is it? How is it? How many centimeters?

subtitles.original: 何センチ？ 何センチ？ どう？ どう？
subtitles.english: How many? How many? How is it? How is it?

subtitles.original: え、何みんなすま... ねー、ねー、ねー、ねー、何センチ何センチ？
subtitles.english: Eh, why is everyone... Hey, hey, hey, how many centimeters?

subtitles.original: おい！ 俺を放っとくんじゃね！
subtitles.english: Hey! Don't leave me hanging!

subtitles.original: ねー何センチ何センチだって聞いて、早く！
subtitles.english: Hey, how many centimeters, I asked, hurry!

subtitles.original: ねー何センチ！ 何センチ！
subtitles.english: Hey, how many centimeters! How many!

subtitles.original: あー無理、全部無理。
subtitles.english: Ah, impossible, everything is impossible.

subtitles.original: え、何？ 沙花叉死んだ？ え？
subtitles.english: Eh, what? Did Sakamata die? Eh?

subtitles.original: 何センチでした。え、15センチ。
subtitles.english: The result... was 15 cm.

subtitles.original: ねーー！ 絶対そんなことない！
subtitles.english: No way! There's no way!

subtitles.original: いや、絶対そんなことなくない？
subtitles.english: No, isn't there no way?

subtitles.original: え、今もっと上がってたよね？ え？
subtitles.english: Eh, I was up higher just now, right? Eh?

subtitles.original: 絶対理不尽。え？
subtitles.english: Totally unfair. Eh?

subtitles.original: 僕操作されてるんだけど。
subtitles.english: I'm being manipulated.

subtitles.original: え、もう一回？ え？ 台本にないじゃん。
subtitles.english: Eh, one more time? Eh? It's not in the script.

subtitles.original: え？ マジで？ あー、いいよじゃあ。
subtitles.english: Eh? Seriously? Ah, fine then.

subtitles.original: しょうがないなあ。もう一回。いくよ。
subtitles.english: Can't be helped. One more time. Here I go.

subtitles.original: ちょっとこのさー、メジャーもちゃんとして。
subtitles.english: Make sure the tape measure is set properly too.

subtitles.original: いくよ。せーの、はい！
subtitles.english: Here I go. One, two, go!

subtitles.original: どう？ どう？ めっちゃ上がってる、めっちゃ上がってる。
subtitles.english: How is it? How is it? It's way up, way up.

subtitles.original: ねーどうですか？ ねー何センチは今で、今。
subtitles.english: Hey, how is it? Hey, how many centimeters right now, right now.

subtitles.original: お前今測ってとか言って。何セ...
subtitles.english: You, tell them to measure now. How many...

subtitles.original: 全部無理。
subtitles.english: Everything's impossible.

subtitles.original: 何センチなわけないだろ。何センチなわけないだろ。
subtitles.english: There's no way it's that many centimeters. No way it's that many.

subtitles.original: 絶対変。絶対変。次行きましょうかじゃないでしょ。
subtitles.english: It's definitely weird. Definitely weird. It shouldn't be "shall we move on".

subtitles.original: ね、次行きましょうかじゃないでしょ。
subtitles.english: Hey, it shouldn't be "shall we move on".

subtitles.original: ひどい... 頑張ったのに。
subtitles.english: Cruel... even though I worked so hard.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで。
subtitles.english: Okay, so.

subtitles.original: 最後さ、そう、沙花叉クロヱの自信がある、おまちかね、腹筋です！
subtitles.english: Lastly, yes, the one Sakamata Chloe is confident in, the long-awaited abdominal exercises!

subtitles.original: いや、もうこれはね、普段からやってますので。
subtitles.english: Well, this is something I do regularly.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、行きますか。
subtitles.english: So, shall we go.

subtitles.original: 何これ何これ？ え？
subtitles.english: What is this, what is this? Eh?

subtitles.original: なんか、腹筋ローラーじゃないこれ？
subtitles.english: Isn't this an ab roller?

subtitles.original: 腹筋ローラーですよねこれね？
subtitles.english: It's an ab roller, isn't it?

subtitles.original: え？ いや、腹筋でしょやるの。は？
subtitles.english: Eh? No, I'm doing sit-ups. Huh?

subtitles.original: え、腹筋ローラーやるんですか？ 地獄じゃない？
subtitles.english: Eh, am I doing the ab roller? Isn't that hell?

subtitles.original: え、地獄じゃない？
subtitles.english: Eh, isn't that hell?

subtitles.original: え、沙花叉これじゃなくないやるの？ かわいそうくない？ え？
subtitles.english: Eh, isn't this not what I'm supposed to do? Isn't it pitiful? Eh?

subtitles.original: あー！ お願いします！ 許すですじゃない！
subtitles.english: Ah! Please! It's not "I forgive you"!

subtitles.original: ねーやばいやばいやばい！ 死ぬ死ぬ死ぬ！
subtitles.english: Hey, this is bad, bad, bad! I'm gonna die, die, die!

subtitles.original: 死ぬ！ あーーーー！
subtitles.english: Die! Aaaa!

subtitles.original: これが望みか！ なあ！
subtitles.english: Is this what you wanted! Well!

subtitles.original: これでいいのか大人たちは！
subtitles.english: Is this okay with you adults!

subtitles.original: 良くないよねモレちゃん。モレちゃんグッドサイン出してるんだけど。
subtitles.english: It's not good, right, Mare-chan. Mare-chan is giving a thumbs up though.

subtitles.original: ねーこっち来る？
subtitles.english: Hey, you coming here?

subtitles.original: ねーもうやら... もうやだ。
subtitles.english: Hey, I won't... I don't want to anymore.

subtitles.original: かわいそう沙花叉。
subtitles.english: Poor Sakamata.

subtitles.original: え？ なんか普通の腹筋だったら自信あるんですかって聞かれたんですけど。はい！
subtitles.english: Eh? I was asked if I'm confident if it's just normal sit-ups. Yes!

subtitles.original: 超自信あります。
subtitles.english: I'm super confident.

subtitles.original: 今やってるから。
subtitles.english: Because I'm doing them now.

subtitles.original: え？ 30秒で何回いける？
subtitles.english: Eh? How many can I do in 30 seconds?

subtitles.original: え、そりゃもう40ぐらい行くんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Eh, probably about 40?

subtitles.original: いや、40ぐらい行っちゃうし。いいですよ。
subtitles.english: No, I'll definitely do about 40. Fine.

subtitles.original: あー、やっていって。じゃあ40ぐらい行きますか。
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll do it. Then, shall we aim for 40?

subtitles.original: ちょっとやりましょう。えっとどうする？
subtitles.english: Let's do it. Well, what do I do?

subtitles.original: おい。こう？ こうで、こう。
subtitles.english: Hey. Like this? Like this, then this.

subtitles.original: え？ 違う？
subtitles.english: Eh? Am I wrong?

subtitles.original: え？ 違うの？ あれ？ 大人たちが困ってる。
subtitles.english: Eh? It's wrong? Huh? The adults are confused.

subtitles.original: あー、こっち？ あー、こっちか。あー、わかった。
subtitles.english: Ah, this way? Ah, it's this way. Ah, I get it.

subtitles.original: はい。いくよ。あー、足...
subtitles.english: Okay. Here I go. Ah, my legs...
